channel.title: Npc help!

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

public void logout(){ outStream.createFrame(109); if(playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("#1") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("#2")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "#3" +playerName+ " has logged out"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("#") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("#") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("#")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner and coder " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerIsMember == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Dude " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerIsMember == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Dude " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } }
For #1 Remove it and put the owners name
For #2 Remove it and put Co-Owners Name u can just put any random name too if u want until u have a co-owner
for #'s put in admins and mods i guess.
and the Dude’s Are regular players. so when a regular player logs out itll say they logged out.

PUT THIS IN ClIENT.JAVA << i have it their since im using delta im not so sure about u :S but i think its in client.java in source folder.

Rep++ please if it helps

Read full topic

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @xhunterzx xhunterzx
item.description:
@xhunterzx wrote:

Lmao why would u want a npc to say that -__- ur like trying to make ur self famous when u are the owner of the server. just make a code where when u log in it says in everyone’s chatbox Owner Visionsape123 has logged on, and when u log out it says u loged out. thats what i have atleast.

item.title: Npc help!
item.dc:creator: @visionscape123 visionscape123
item.description:
@visionscape123 wrote:

hey guys, i want to make an npc shout telling everyone whether im online or not.

this is the code i use in npchandler.java

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("radiation")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "[Owner] Radiation is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "[Owner] Radiation is OFFLINE"; } } }

and the npc wont say it? he just stands there? how do i fix it?

Read full topic
